title: Chapter 1100 - Su Xuanjun Fails To Understand A Woman’S Heart
body:
Chapter 1100 - Su Xuanjun Fails To Understand A Woman’S Heart

The Heavensdeath Demon Empress’s expression was strange. Who knew what she was thinking, but she couldn’t help but giggle.

As crafty and smug as a fox who’d just run off with a chicken.

Were the Sixth Warden here to see this, he likely couldn’t have imagined that this radiant, smiling young woman and the cold, aloof, contemptuous founder of the Demons’ Elysium were one and the same. 

The disparity really was enormous.

This was part of her capricious nature. Sometimes, she was like a peerless immortal beauty of the yao path, her every gesture grand and dignified. 

Other times, she seemed as enchanting as a demoness, her every gesture amorous enough to bewitch the masses.

Other times, she was cold and aloof as ice, like a sovereign gazing indifferently down upon her domain.

And sometimes, in front of Su Yi, she seemed like a lively, crafty little girl. She smiled charmingly, and she...
original_title: Chapter 1100 - Su Xuanjun Fails to Understand a Woman’s Heart
